metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3250 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Apache Directory LDAP API before 1.0.0-M31 allows attackers to conduct timing attacks via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3250` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache-directory-api-java - 1.0.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apache-directory-api package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.0-1').
